name: Humans Must Prevail
description:
Destroy cities, wreak havoc and meet your unavoidable demise in this fast and chaotic monster "simulator".

Features:

  • Customize your monster with different body parts and skins that give you different bonuses and penalties.
  • 32 skills to wreak havoc on the city:
    • Fireball
    • Laser
    • Roar
    • Stomp
    • Small Heal
    • Total Heal
    • Blue Sacrifice
    • Red Sacrifice
    • Small Shield
    • High Shield
    • Total Shield
    • Magnet
    • Strength Boost
    • Speed Boost
    • Slow Time
    • Nuclear Explosion
    • Meteor Rain
    • Fire Ring
    • Freeze Blast
    • Minions
    • Chain Lightning
    • Carnivore
    • Tornado
    • Flood
    • EMP
    • Super Dash
    • Super Slash
    • Black Hole
    • Supersize
    • Only Blue Orbs
    • Only Red Orbs
    • Only Coins
  • Never ending waves of enemies to statisfy your thirst of destruction (or silliness).

Known bugs:

  • Only the "Saur" model is working now for the player. If you change it the game will break.
  • Physics glitching, like the player jumping on certain ocassions.

Early Beta Access, grants you the full game now and in the future updates. Also will let you redeem in the future your purchase for a Steam key.
